summary: A small appearance tuning of the evergreen Lydia, original feel intact. It includes: new hair, custom eye texture, feminine animations, light foot perk added and Facegen data do avoid the pesky neck seam. Available in Two Versions.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=150][color=yellow]Enhanced Lydia[/color][/size]
by [i][color=red]Magistrate[/color][/i]

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Version_zps3eca453f.jpg[/img]

1.1

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Description_zpsd5aebd43.jpg[/img]

A small appearance tuning of the evergreen Lydia, nothing groundbreaking, original feel left intact, the mod includes: new hair, [i]custom[/i] eye texture, feminine animations, light foot perk added and Facegen data do avoid the pesky neck seam.

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Features_zps83542778.jpg[/img]

[color=red][i]Physical Appareance[/i][/color]
Enhance Lydia with beautiful hair (from Apachii) - See screenshots to choose which version to run:
* Version A
* Version B

[color=green][i]Unique Custom Retextured Bright Green Eyes[/i][/color]
and a unique custom retexture (included) of new bright green eyes

[color=orange][i]Feminine Animations[/i][/color]
Unchecked the \"opposed gender animation\"

[color=red][i]Embedded Avoiding Traps Ability[/i][/color]
Added Light Foot Perk to avoid her triggering traps.

[color=green][i]FacegenData[/i][/color]
To prevent neck seams due to Bethesda\'s infamous NPC bug.

[color=orange][i]Perfect Compatibility with popular Companion Overhaul mods[/i][/color]
Such as UFO, AFT, etc... Just load my mod after theirs.

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_ChangeLog_zpsf1ef8cda.jpg[/img]

1.0 
Initial release.
1.1
Reorganized files. Now there are two versions with different hairs (see screenshots)
	Version A : Long hairs, clip a bit.
	Version B : Shorter hairs, no clipping.

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Required_zps5e5bbe01.jpg[/img]
	
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Reccomended_zps7b9a73d9.jpg[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569]Univision Face[/url] - (to make Lydia look exactly like in the screenshots)

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Installation_zps65c9502d.jpg[/img]

Extract the content of the zip file in your data folder.

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Uninstallation_zps145493ef.jpg[/img]

Delete \"Enhanced Lydia (Ver.A).esp\" or Delete \"Enhanced Lydia (Ver.B).esp\"
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint\\Skyrim.esm\\000A2C8E.dds
Delete \\Data\\Meshes\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\Skyrim.esm\\000A2C8E.nif

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Compatibility_zps11004cdf.jpg[/img]

Compatible with UFO, AFT and any other Companions Overhaul mods as long as you put \"Enhanced Lydia.esp\" after them.
Not compatible with other mods which change Lydia\'s appearance.

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_SpecialNotes_zpscefc7348.jpg[/img]

[i][color=red][size=1]While I certainly like to stay \"in lore\" I do not consider it as a Bible but more as guidelines. After all, if one had to respect lore 100% - NO MODS - would be allowed, so if you like the vanilla look of Skyrim or things such as wrinkles for everybody, ugly textures or greasy hair (believe it or not in medieval times they DID have soap and oils to beautify hairs) this mod is NOT for you. Besides, I don\'t want to rain on anyone\'s parade but Skyrim is NOT realistic, unless you account magic, dragons, undead and stuff as something that exists in the real world; it is instead a fantasy game in an exceptionally well realized fantasy environment and in THAT way I believe lore should be respected. Why am I telling you this? Because I received criticism for my mod not to be lore friendly based on the facetexture which I use that is NOT EVEN included in this mod (it is merely suggested).[/size][/color][/i]

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Credits_zps5740cbb7.jpg[/img]

Apachii - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_MyOtherMods_zps11728575.jpg[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27743]Spell - Brilliance[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28243]Colored Nails[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28431/]Enhanced Lydia[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28457/]Magistrate Eyes[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28588/]Improved Soultrap[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28684]Daedric Letters Warpaint[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29543/]Merchant Stock Respawn Fix[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29600/]Spell - Levitate[/url]

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Permissions_zpsedde305f.jpg[/img]

You are permitted to use these files in your mod as long as you send me a message to ask for permission and you credit me for use of my files.

[i][color=cyan]This mod has been cleaned with TES5Edit.[/color][/i]

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Contact_zpsb87a9a46.jpg[/img]
[url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1427216-relz-spell-brilliance-an-alternative-to-candlelight/]Magistrate on Bethesda\'s Forum.[/url]
Magistrate on Nexus.[/center]
